content.prompt: Which of the following is a similarity between the views expressed in the excerpt and Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.’s "Letter from Birmingham Jail"?

choices.label: Unlike César Chávez, Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. supported the use of violence after all other means had been exhausted.
Unlike Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., César Chávez supported the use of violence as a means to start the movement.
Both César Chávez and Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. argued for the continued use of nonviolence to further their causes.
Both César Chávez and Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. argued for the use of nonviolence after standards of equality had been met.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain how the implications of the argument or perspective in the source may affect political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
